profile.bio: Surge Accelerator Alumni. Expertise in branding, web development, project management, graphic design, virtual currencies & decentralized consensus technologies. Current directorships held: The Coinsultants, Texas Coinitiative, Genesis Solutions & Snap Hedge, USA.
